summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 VOLKSWAGEN JETTA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS AN INTERMITTENT ELECTRICAL SHORT CAUSING THE HEADLIGHTS AND THE WIPERS TO TURN OFF UNEXPECTEDLY. ALSO, THE HORN AND THE TEMPERATURE CONTROLS FAILED TO WORK. THE CONTACT WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 11V196000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
